member.name: M:Telerik.Windows.Controls.ChartView.SkiaRenderTarget.CalculateTieredPlotAreaSize(Telerik.Charting.RadRect)
member.summary: A method that calculates a tiered plot area size. This is to reduce the number of times a render target is created, so that flickering is reduced when resizing the chart.
